wikipedia_page.main: Willoughby Hamilton (born as James Willoughby Hamilton; 9 December 1864 – 27 September 1943) was a co-world No. 1 Irish male tennis player, a footballer and international badminton player.

response: * September 27 – Willoughby Hamilton, Irish tennis player (b. 1864)
* Wimbledon Men's Singles Championship – Willoughby Hamilton (GB) defeats William Renshaw (GB) 6–8 6–2 3–6 6–1 6–1
*27 September – Willoughby Hamilton, tennis player, Wimbledon Champion in 1890 (born 1864).
Monasterevin is the birthplace of Wimbledon Tennis Champion Willoughby Hamilton.
